title: I wish we had a legendary Ashe skin @katey
body:
I know Ashe has tons of skins. Thing is, most of them are recolors. A few have a new model, or recolored effects.

@katey Would Ashe be considered for a legendary skin, since she doesn't have one or should I expect other champs to be visited first?

replies.body: She's eligible for a skin, and that said, it could be any particular tier. :)
Wouldn't the goal be though to give her a skin with some particles given that some complained about Marauder Ashe?
Yup, that'd be optimal.
I'd love to see a Star Guardian Ashe to accompany Star Guardian Lux for a Star Guardian botlane duo.

I'd prefer something darker, because all of her skins are bright and lovely, marauder ashe is a bit darker indeed, but the missing particles keep that skin away from beeing that kind of dark that i think of. 
Anyways I am fine with any new skins for ashe <3 (cmon pool party ashe....it's so cold in freljord she needs a break....<3)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BqiFuU3V,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-06-22T18:14:35.010+0000)
>
> She's eligible for a skin, and that said, it could be any particular tier. :)

Good to know :)
cant wait to see that if it's happening

she needs a Dragon wanderer ashe skin
Her ult is 2 dragons moving in a spiral motion
i only want this because RYU GA TEKI WA KURAU

> [{quoted}](name=Derpyon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BqiFuU3V,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-06-17T07:04:33.039+0000)
>
> she needs a Dragon wanderer ashe skin
> Her ult is 2 dragons moving in a spiral motion
> i only want this because RYU GA TEKI WA KURAU

I would buy this.
Well, Heartseeker, Queen and Amethyst Ashe are pretty damn good, but I love Ashe, and she needs some love too.

> [{quoted}](name=Kittenguin,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BqiFuU3V,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-06-17T07:08:28.375+0000)
>
> Well, Heartseeker, Queen and Amethyst Ashe are pretty damn good, but I love Ashe, and she needs some love too.

I agree they're good, but sometimes I want something that's not "Real world archer, with a slight twist." Like, PROJECT Ashe would be such a refreshing change of pace, because her bow is mechanical. Or anything with a unique VO. Or... just, *something* to make playing Ashe feel different. 

Her skins are cool, don't get me wrong, but none of them feel like they change her character in the slightest.

> [{quoted}](name=Ashe Jungle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BqiFuU3V,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-06-18T19:50:39.172+0000)
>
> I agree they're good, but sometimes I want something that's not "Real world archer, with a slight twist." Like, PROJECT Ashe would be such a refreshing change of pace, because her bow is mechanical. Or anything with a unique VO. Or... just, *something* to make playing Ashe feel different. 
> 
> Her skins are cool, don't get me wrong, but none of them feel like they change her character in the slightest.

How about an Iceborn Ashe skin? She will look like Lissandra with a Dark Ice bow and new VO. Or Blackfrost Ashe.

> [{quoted}](name=Kittenguin,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BqiFuU3V,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-06-19T06:59:39.285+0000)
>
> How about an Iceborn Ashe skin? She will look like Lissandra with a Dark Ice bow and new VO. Or Blackfrost Ashe.

Those would both be awesome.

Or dark star ashe.

> [{quoted}](name=Ashe Jungle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BqiFuU3V,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-06-16T23:38:48.127+0000)
>
> I know Ashe has tons of skins. Thing is, most of them are recolors. A few have a new model, or recolored effects.
> 
> @katey Would Ashe be considered for a legendary skin, since she doesn&#039;t have one or should I expect other champs to be visited first?

Project Ashe is in the works, a "Project Ashe Tee" leaked in the store a day or two ago, along with Kat.

> [{quoted}](name=Azuk the Jungler,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BqiFuU3V,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-06-24T02:58:03.047+0000)
>
> Project Ashe is in the works, a "Project Ashe Tee" leaked in the store a day or two ago, along with Kat.

My ~~body~~ wallet is ready. o.O

[PROJECT: Ashe Tee](http://imgur.com/WpFzrqs) was found on Riot's website and promptly removed...you may not have to wait long friend 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
thank you i just had an orgasm because of the information
Maybe something like an Arclight Ashe skin

> [{quoted}](name=James Winter,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BqiFuU3V,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-17T05:20:06.562+0000)
>
> Maybe something like an Arclight Ashe skin

I would buy this.

Here's a idea for Riot
http://orig08.deviantart.net/a9d9/f/2015/142/1/2/lol_star_guardian_ashe_by_chanseven-d8uazbb.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Demopyro2,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BqiFuU3V,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-17T00:00:27.561+0000)
>
> Here's a idea for Riot
> http://orig08.deviantart.net/a9d9/f/2015/142/1/2/lol_star_guardian_ashe_by_chanseven-d8uazbb.jpg

Looks too much like heartseeker, IMO.
I think that's fair, but there's room for Star Guardian Ashe with a more distinct design.

> [{quoted}](name=kDrakari,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BqiFuU3V,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-06-22T19:50:08.849+0000)
>
> I think that's fair, but there's room for Star Guardian Ashe with a more distinct design.

Maybe, but that's harder to justify compared to a more distinct skin. Wouldn't be surprised to see it eventually. Eventually.

i've already seen the idea for star guardian jinx and i think why not doing a similar thing with ashe but using mercury's planet for it like in sailor moon, so it would still fit with ice and/or water
Riot hasn't released any **Projects** for Ashe Skins. Rito Merch Shop Leak wutnow?

I want one for her. The thing is it's going to be another Gnar, Draven, or Tryn skin for sure.

I mean my main doesn't even have one. {{champion:43}}

I am a support main so I gotta stick with my girl Janna first. But that aside Ashe is my fav top 3 ADC. I'd be happy to see her getting an advance skin. Something like Valhalla Ashe or Steel Legion Ashe where her arrows have electrifying effects. That would be cool.
I've been saying it for months now
Okay, Ashe.. What about Yorick? RIOT just forgot him, no updates, no skins... That`s bad, when an other champs got tons of skins...
Yorick is on the Champion Update list; once that's complete we'll be able to give him a skin. At this moment, he isn't eligible.

> [{quoted}](name=svanskyy,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BqiFuU3V,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-06-17T09:39:05.810+0000)
>
> Okay, Ashe.. What about Yorick? RIOT just forgot him, no updates, no skins... That`s bad, when an other champs got tons of skins...

Riot hasn't forgotten Yorick. He's not going to get a skin until he gets a full model update, which he will get with his VGU, which *should* be landing some time this year.
